error.verbose: Variable 'z' is modified inside assert statement. Assert statements are removed from release builds so the code inside assert statement is not executed. If the code is needed also in release builds, this is a bug.

error.msg: Assert statement calls a function which may have desired side effects: 'my_function'.
error.verbose: Non-pure function: 'my_function' is called inside assert statement. Assert statements are removed from release builds so the code inside assert statement is not executed. If the code is needed also in release builds, this is a bug.

error.msg: Assignment of function parameter has no effect outside the function. Did you forget dereferencing it?
error.verbose: Assignment of function parameter has no effect outside the function. Did you forget dereferencing it?

error.msg: Address of local auto-variable assigned to a function parameter.
error.verbose: Dangerous assignment - the function parameter is assigned the address of a local auto-variable. Local auto-variables are reserved from the stack which is freed when the function ends. So the pointer to a local variable is invalid after the function ends.

error.msg: Comparison of a boolean expression with an integer other than 0 or 1.
error.verbose: Comparison of a boolean expression with an integer other than 0 or 1.

error.msg: Non-boolean value returned from function returning bool
error.verbose: Non-boolean value returned from function returning bool

error.msg: Either the condition 'count==1000' is redundant or the array 'buf[10]' is accessed at index 1000, which is out of bounds.
error.verbose: Either the condition 'count==1000' is redundant or the array 'buf[10]' is accessed at index 1000, which is out of bounds.

location.info: Assuming that condition 'count==1000' is not redundant

error.msg: Member variable 'A::x' is not initialized in the constructor.
error.verbose: Member variable 'A::x' is not initialized in the constructor.

error.msg: Technically the member function 'MySpecialType::DontThrow' can be static (but you may consider moving to unnamed namespace).
error.verbose: The member function 'MySpecialType::DontThrow' can be made a static function. Making a function static can bring a performance benefit since no 'this' instance is passed to the function. This change should not cause compiler errors but it does not necessarily make sense conceptually. Think about your design and the task of the function first - is it a function that must not access members of class instances? And maybe it is more appropriate to move this function to a unnamed namespace.

error.msg: Exception thrown in function declared not to throw exceptions.
error.verbose: Exception thrown in function declared not to throw exceptions.

error.msg: Either the condition 'tok' is redundant or there is possible null pointer dereference: tok.
error.verbose: Either the condition 'tok' is redundant or there is possible null pointer dereference: tok.

location.info: Assuming that condition 'tok' is not redundant

error.msg: The scope of the variable 'buf' can be reduced.
Using iterator to local container 'items' that may be invalid.
error.verbose: Using iterator to local container 'items' that may be invalid.

location.info: After calling 'erase', iterators or references to the container's data may be invalid .
Iterator to container is created here.

error.msg: Variable 'buf[count]' is assigned a value that is never used.
error.verbose: Variable 'buf[count]' is assigned a value that is never used.

error.msg: Variable 'tok' is assigned a value that is never used.
error.verbose: Variable 'tok' is assigned a value that is never used.
